description: Performance Overview Dashboard of Apache IoTDB

targets.expr: (sum(process_total_mem{cluster=~"$cluster", nodeType=~"$nodeType"}) by (instance) - sum(process_free_mem{cluster=~"$cluster", nodeType=~"$nodeType"}) by (instance)) / sum(sys_total_physical_memory_size{cluster=~"$cluster", nodeType=~"$nodeType", name="system"}) by (instance)

panels.title: Average Time Consumed Of Schedule Stage $instance
Average Time Consumed Of Local Schedule Stage $instance
Average Time Consumed Of Storage Stage $instance
Average Time Consumed Of Engine Stage $instance
P99 Time Consumed Of Schedule Stage $instance
P99 Time Consumed Of Local Schedule Stage $instance
P99 Time Consumed Of Storage Stage $instance
P99 Time Consumed Of Engine Stage $instance

title: Apache IoTDB Performance Overview Dashboard
